'''Morwen''' was the daughter of [[Húrin (Warden of the Keys)]], in the drafts of the [[Appendices]]. She was to be wed to [[Éomer]], but her character was ultimately abandoned and replaced with that of [[Lothíriel]].<ref>{{PM|Aiii}}, p. 271</ref>
